channel.title: [[Help]] Getting rid of this message.. -.-
channel.description:
The poision wears off.. The poision wears off.. The poision wears off.. The poision wears off.. The poision wears off.. The poision wears off.. The poision wears off.. The poision wears off..
Over and over and over until i log out.. any ideas where to shut that thing off?

item.title: [[Help]] Getting rid of this message.. -.-
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

uder public boolean process try adding:

if(poisoned && System.currentTimeMillis() - poisonDelay > 15000){ poisonDmg = true; applyPoisonToMe(); poisonDmg = false; poisonDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic
